task_input.question: Compose a poem - a poem about a haircut! But lofty, noble, tragic, timeless, full of love, treachery, retribution, quiet heroism in the face of certain doom! Six lines, cleverly rhymed, and every word beginning with the letter s!

gemini-2.0-flash-thinking-exp-01-21-poem.task_output:
Silent shears swiftly sever silken strands,
Solemn soul shrinks, sadly sensing sands.
Sacrifice sought, silently, strength suppressed,
Severed splendor, secrets softly stressed.
Soon, stark skull shows, sorrow starts to sting,
Still, steadfast spirit sings, silently, spring.

task_details.reasoning:

Solemn soul shrinks, sadly sensing sands.
Sacrifice sought, silently, strength suppressed,
Severed splendor, secrets softly stressed.
Soon, stark skull shows, sorrow starts to sting,
Still, steadfast spirit sings, silently, spring.

task_input.question: Compose a poem - a poem about a haircut! But lofty, noble, tragic, timeless, full of love, treachery, retribution, quiet heroism in the face of certain doom! Six lines, cleverly rhymed, and every word beginning with the letter s!

gemini-2.0-flash-thinking-exp-01-21-poem.task_output:
Suddenly shorn, Samson sadly slumped,
Severed strength, silently, swiftly slipped.
Soulful sighs, stolen secrets spurned,
Sacrificed strands, savagely scorned, singed.
Shadows stalk, seeking sinful souls,
Still, Samson stands, showing stoic soul.

Still, Samson stands, showing stoic soul.
